title: Premiere: Paperwhite – Magic (Auxiliary Tha Masterfader Remix)
body: Dutch producer Auxiliary Tha Masterfader takes **Paperwhite’s** recent single, _Magic_, for a spin on this new remix. Keeping the core elements of the track, namely the killer chorus hook, it’s unrelenting and a definite addition to any summer party mixes. Check it out, alongside the original.
